statements: DELETE FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_status = 'Approved' AND insurance_company_id = 500;
DELETE FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_id = 100 AND filing_type = 'Quarterly Report';
DELETE FROM filing_documents WHERE filing_id = 101 AND document_type = 'Financial Report';
DELETE FROM regulatory_filings WHERE filing_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Draft';
DELETE FROM filing_documents WHERE document_id = 500 AND filing_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM RegulatoryFiling WHERE filing_type = 'Annual' AND filing_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM RegulatoryFiling WHERE company_id = 3 AND filing_status = 'Pending';
